hasPart._instruction: Add all components, including other setups, that are part of this setup. Note that a setup should not be only composed of software.

description._instruction: Enter a short text describing this setup.

location._instruction: Enter the geographic location of this setup. This may include room number, building, institution and/or city.

manufacturer._instruction: Add the manufacturer (private or industrial) that constructed this setup.

name._instruction: Enter a descriptive name for this setup.

type._instruction: Add all types that describe this setup.
